content: Project `Golem GUI AppStore` (https://tinyurl.com/udvgz37) has been pending for a year, it's time to continue to work on what is left. But I decided to revamp it with `Krugurt` toolkit.
Working on the new `noozy` version `4`, an audiophile grade music player for the latest Android. A 12 types of sound processors and advanced sound modeling options in the design.

`kraft` prototype 3.x giving artist the superpower to produce UI components without knowing how to code, Kraft has it all, when you creating or organizing objects, it generates CSS code real-time, you just need to export it.

Made another version of `Playmemories` for desktop (Linux) (https://bit.ly/2HLr2In). It can manipulates the Sony Cybershot LensStyle Camera device remotely and Auto-Focusing with a mouse-click on the shoot area. Video recording and zoom control. The binary version (https://bit.ly/2HxCpTZ).
